title: Search for a Delegate
description: For fine-grained searches, use the `search` endpoint.

page.description: The number of the page that will be returned.

limit.description: The number of resources per page.

address.description: The address of the delegate to be retrieved.

publicKey.description: The public key of the delegate to be retrieved.

username.description: The username of the delegate to be retrieved.

usernames.description: The usernames of the delegates to be retrieved.

approval.description: The approval rate of the delegates to be retrieved.

approval.from.description: The lower limit of the approval rate.

approval.to.description: The upper limit of the approval rate.

forgedFees.description: The forged fees of the delegates to be retrieved.

forgedFees.from.description: The lower limit of the forged fees.

forgedFees.to.description: The upper limit of the forged fees.

forgedRewards.description: The forged rewards of the delegates to be retrieved.

forgedRewards.from.description: The lower limit of the forged rewards.

forgedRewards.to.description: The upper limit of the forged rewards.

forgedTotal.description: The forged total of the delegates to be retrieved.

forgedTotal.from.description: The lower limit of the forged total.

forgedTotal.to.description: The upper limit of the forged total.

producedBlocks.description: The produced blocks count of the delegates to be retrieved.

producedBlocks.from.description: The lower limit of the produced blocks count.

producedBlocks.to.description: The upper limit of the produced blocks count.

voteBalance.description: The vote balance of the delegates to be retrieved.

voteBalance.from.description: The lower limit of the vote balance.

voteBalance.to.description: The upper limit of the vote balance.
